Package main.gamesystem

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
main.gamesystem.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Class for running main battle system. Control all available battle sequences logic and give result to player. Class is received command from a user interface via gameEnvironment and execute relevant methods

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment, Team opponent, DifficultyOption difficulty)
      Game Manager Constructor
      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - Game Environment which will be interacted with this class
      opponent - Opponent team that player to play with
      difficulty - difficulty option to control match difficulty

    • getOpponent

    • getSetNumber

      public int getSetNumber()
      get current set of match
      Returns:
      integer value about current set

    • getAdjustedStat

      public int[][] getAdjustedStat()
      method return athletes' range of offensive and defensive stat corrections
      Returns:
      integer values about athletes' range of offensive and defensive stat corrections in 2D array

    • isSet

      public boolean isSet()
      Check whether set is over
      Returns:
      if at least one athlete get 3 score this method returns true

    • isGame

      public boolean isGame()
      Check whether game is finish
      Returns:
      if at least one Team's score is 12 this method returns true

    • setOffensiveAdjust

      public void setOffensiveAdjust(int flag)
      Adjusting method for player's athlete's offensive statistics.
      Parameters:
      flag - use integer value 0 and 1. When flag is 0, minimum and maximum of adjusted statistics become increased When flag is 1, minimum and maximum of adjusted statistics become decreased

    • setDefensiveAdjust

      public void setDefensiveAdjust(int flag)
      Adjusting method for player's athlete's defensive statistics.
      Parameters:
      flag - use integer value 0 and 1. When flag is 0, minimum and maximum of adjusted statistics become increased When flag is 1, minimum and maximum of adjusted statistics become decreased

    • setOpponentAdjustStat

      private int setOpponentAdjustStat()
      Opponent offense and defense stat adjustment method
      Returns:
      int value about adjusting opponentBuff

    • battle

      public void battle()
      main battle is executed when this method is called.

      public void playerOnStadium()
      assign playerAthlete and opponentAthlete during each set for battle

    • battleMessage

      public String battleMessage()
      give feedback and result about each fight between player's athlete and opponent's athlete
      Returns:
      String value about each fight result
